duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, configure, and develop custom solutions in Microsoft Power platform, specifically Power Apps and Microsoft Dynamics 365.
Support and build on the MPP application, including providing batch job monitoring and integration monitoring.
Effectively present information to C-level management, public groups, and/or the board of directors.
Provide full life-cycle implementation of Dynamics 365 and demonstrate knowledge and experience in ERP implementation principles and practices.
Utilize Agile methodology and demonstrate experience across the full MS BI Stack.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
